        Parameters:

      • endGame

        public int endGame()
        Checks if the game is over.
        Returns:
        returns 1 if the game board is full or someone has won.

      • fullBoard

        Checks if the board is full.
        Returns:
        1 if board is full otherwise returns 0.

        Parameters:

      • playai

        public void playai(char player)
        Ai function which plays for computer. It blocks the user if user has already set 3 pieces vertically or horizontally.
        Parameters:
        player - 'O' value for computer.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        After the game is finished it resets the board and sets turn to first player.

        Checks if one of the players has won and prints out dialog boxes.
        Parameters:
        player - X or O value for players
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if no one has won
